title: Should I continue writing this???
body:
Summary: Kinda Royalty AU thing, historical setting. I will come up with a better summary if I continue.

Warnings: None that I can think of - Maybe a bratty child?

Word count: 341


~ Prologue ~

He could feel the soft rug beneath his feet, tickling in between his toes as he made his way down the hallway, the faint smell of wax lingering in the air from the candles long extinguished. He had been laying within his chambers for what felt like hours, what appeared to be his constant state of malice only intensifying by the second.

How could they expect that of me?

I wish to be alone, why do they not see?

Within, he was a good child. He withheld a heart capable of extraordinary kindness but he was born into a life that held expectations of power, authority and great hatred.

To please Father.

Now, he sat in the luxurious chair by the window that overlooked the palace gardens. The bright roses could be made out even in the darkness, the moonlight glistening and reflecting off of the dew-covered petals. Fiddling with the gold trim on the chair, a frustrated sob escaped his plump lips and hot tears of anger began to stream down his soft cheeks. However, the enraged cries began to turn into that of sadness.

The little Prince was lonely.

He was startled by the soft scuffing of the heavy wooden door on the carpet and turned around with such speed that his vision was obscured for a moment before he was able to focus on the small figure in the doorway, rubbing the sleep from her eyes as her silky ringlets fell gently atop her shoulders.

“Why are you crying, Prince Harry?”

“None of your business.”

“I just want to help.”

His first instinct was to snap back at her, to tell her to leave him be. But his words were caught in his throat and before he could process his thoughts – like a reasonable Prince should – he was choking out a different response;

“Why?”

Do not ask questions. People answer to you, you do not answer to them.

What would his father say?

“Because I would like to be your friend.”

Then there was nothing but blinding fury.

title: The Greatest Showmance
body:
Prologue

*Chapter 1 coming December 25th, 2018*

Fic Masterlist

A/N: You all can blame @trulymadlysydney for making me watch this movie because this is what it’s resulted in. 

“Nothing can keep us apart cause you are the one I was meant to find.”

Confused, distraught, embarrassed… You’re not even sure what you’re feeling in this moment - but it’s somewhere in the mix of those three emotions.

The tears continue streaming down your face as you hike up your long dress, and continue down the hallway towards the entrance of the building despite the footsteps and calling that follows after you.

“Y/N please wait,” the voice calls out again and you don’t have to turn around to know it’s Harry desperately trying to get your attention. You take a few more steps before deciding it’s not worth it to keep running, but rather best to face the issue at hand. 

With a deep breath you slow to a stop and sniffle, whipping around to meet your best friend with your red puffy eyes. “What Harry?” You snap harshly, and it’s not until then you see the tears threatening to spill out of his watery green orbs. “What could you possibly want from me right now?”

“I-I,” he stammers in response and nervously glances down at his designer suit, ashamedly trying to hide the guilt he feels about everything. “I needed to make sure you were ok, I’m so sorry. I didn’t mean for any of this happen.”

“Well you did a pretty shit job of making sure this isn’t how things played out,” you struggle to tell him as it feels like an invisible weight is residing on your chest; causing your breaths to come out hitched and uneven. “God, it’s like I don’t even know you anymore Harry.”

“Don’t know me anymore?” He asks, lowering his voice into a whisper as hurt flashes over his perfectly structured features. “I’m still me, Y/N. I’m still your best friend, and I’m still the man who is in lov-.”

You narrow your teary gaze at him as he cuts himself off before completing his sentence; letting out a small sarcastic laugh and shaking your head as he doesn’t finish his argument. “The man who is what, Harry?”

“The man who is in love with you,” he states, as his eyes pleadingly stare into yours. “Fuck. I don’t know why it’s taken me so long to say that, and I know now is not the best timing but-.”

“No Harry,” you speak over him and shake your head. “If you’re saying this because we had sex, you can take it back right now.” His eyes widen at your words, and you let out another laugh; mainly at yourself this time. “And the funny thing is… If you told me that a month ago, before any of this happened; I would’ve believed you. Why? Because I love you Harry, I always have. I figured agreeing to do this whole thing would help me muster up the courage to finally tell you that, and hell there even was a point where I thought you might’ve actually felt the same. And maybe you do, but your career comes first. It will always come first, which is ok - but because of that; this can’t happen. We can’t happen.”

“You’re wrong about that and you know it,” he argues, stepping forward so he can be closer to you. “We can happen. Y/N, I do love you. I have for years now, it’s not like I’ve tried to hide it. I can’t imagine myself with anyone else at this point… We were made for each other.”

“Were we? Because everything that has gone on in our lives as of late would beg to differ.” 

“Who cares about any of that? I don’t,” he explains desperately as he reaches out to gently grab ahold of your hands, and rubs his thumbs across your knuckles. “This relationship may have started out as a publicity stunt, but it’s not like that anymore and it never should have been. Everything I told you the other night in the hotel room is real, this is real Y/N… I need you.”

“And I need you H,” you whisper, watching as a small glimmer of hope flashes through his eyes. “But not like this.”

“Y/N.”

“It’s impossible Harry,” you state, and that glint of hope slowly fades away from his gaze as you pause to collect your thoughts. “You’ve always said things happen for a reason right? Everything that has happened because of this stunt is adding up to a bigger picture, and it’s clear that us being together isn’t part of that. Who are we to change anything about what fate has in store? Everything keeps us apart, and there’s nothing we can do about that.”

“We can try,” he says quietly in one final plea. 

“There’s no point. I’m sorry Harry, it’s out of our hands.” 

He looks at you with an expression you’ve rarely seen in the years you’ve known him; complete and utter defeat, and that hurts like a bitch. But you have to do this, you have to leave so things fall back into order for him and for you.  

With one final shaky breath and a sniffle, you slowly move away from him to start leaving again; and this time he lets you go. 

Taglist: @trulymadlysydney @alwaysjacked-up @theasstour @writingsfromlee @isitjamiemoriarty @smokeinherperfume @foreverhlessed and @silklaurentharry because these poor souls have had to listen to me go OFF about this. Ily all so much.

“I-I,” he stammers in response and nervously glances down at his designer suit, ashamedly trying to hide the guilt he feels about everything. “I needed to make sure you were ok, I’m so sorry. I didn’t mean for any of this happen.”

“Well you did a pretty shit job of making sure this isn’t how things played out,” you struggle to tell him as it feels like an invisible weight is residing on your chest; causing your breaths to come out hitched and uneven. “God, it’s like I don’t even know you anymore Harry.”

“Don’t know me anymore?” He asks, lowering his voice into a whisper as hurt flashes over his perfectly structured features. “I’m still me, Y/N. I’m still your best friend, and I’m still the man who is in lov-.”

You narrow your teary gaze at him as he cuts himself off before completing his sentence; letting out a small sarcastic laugh and shaking your head as he doesn’t finish his argument. “The man who is what, Harry?”

“The man who is in love with you,” he states, as his eyes pleadingly stare into yours. “Fuck. I don’t know why it’s taken me so long to say that, and I know now is not the best timing but-.”

“No Harry,” you speak over him and shake your head. “If you’re saying this because we had sex, you can take it back right now.” His eyes widen at your words, and you let out another laugh; mainly at yourself this time. “And the funny thing is… If you told me that a month ago, before any of this happened; I would’ve believed you. Why? Because I love you Harry, I always have. I figured agreeing to do this whole thing would help me muster up the courage to finally tell you that, and hell there even was a point where I thought you might’ve actually felt the same. And maybe you do, but your career comes first. It will always come first, which is ok - but because of that; this can’t happen. We can’t happen.”

“You’re wrong about that and you know it,” he argues, stepping forward so he can be closer to you. “We can happen. Y/N, I do love you. I have for years now, it’s not like I’ve tried to hide it. I can’t imagine myself with anyone else at this point… We were made for each other.”

“Were we? Because everything that has gone on in our lives as of late would beg to differ.” 

“Who cares about any of that? I don’t,” he explains desperately as he reaches out to gently grab ahold of your hands, and rubs his thumbs across your knuckles. “This relationship may have started out as a publicity stunt, but it’s not like that anymore and it never should have been. Everything I told you the other night in the hotel room is real, this is real Y/N… I need you.”

“And I need you H,” you whisper, watching as a small glimmer of hope flashes through his eyes. “But not like this.”

“Y/N.”

“It’s impossible Harry,” you state, and that glint of hope slowly fades away from his gaze as you pause to collect your thoughts. “You’ve always said things happen for a reason right? Everything that has happened because of this stunt is adding up to a bigger picture, and it’s clear that us being together isn’t part of that. Who are we to change anything about what fate has in store? Everything keeps us apart, and there’s nothing we can do about that.”

“We can try,” he says quietly in one final plea. 

“There’s no point. I’m sorry Harry, it’s out of our hands.” 

He looks at you with an expression you’ve rarely seen in the years you’ve known him; complete and utter defeat, and that hurts like a bitch. But you have to do this, you have to leave so things fall back into order for him and for you.  

With one final shaky breath and a sniffle, you slowly move away from him to start leaving again; and this time he lets you go. 

Taglist: @trulymadlysydney @alwaysjacked-up @theasstour @writingsfromlee @isitjamiemoriarty @smokeinherperfume @foreverhlessed and @silklaurentharry because these poor souls have had to listen to me go OFF about this. Ily all so much.
trail.content:
Prologue

*Chapter 1 coming December 25th, 2018*

Fic Masterlist

A/N: You all can blame @trulymadlysydney for making me watch this movie because this is what it’s resulted in. 

“Nothing can keep us apart cause you are the one I was meant to find.”

Confused, distraught, embarrassed… You’re not even sure what you’re feeling in this moment - but it’s somewhere in the mix of those three emotions.

The tears continue streaming down your face as you hike up your long dress, and continue down the hallway towards the entrance of the building despite the footsteps and calling that follows after you.

“Y/N please wait,” the voice calls out again and you don’t have to turn around to know it’s Harry desperately trying to get your attention. You take a few more steps before deciding it’s not worth it to keep running, but rather best to face the issue at hand. 

With a deep breath you slow to a stop and sniffle, whipping around to meet your best friend with your red puffy eyes. “What Harry?” You snap harshly, and it’s not until then you see the tears threatening to spill out of his watery green orbs. “What could you possibly want from me right now?”

“I-I,” he stammers in response and nervously glances down at his designer suit, ashamedly trying to hide the guilt he feels about everything. “I needed to make sure you were ok, I’m so sorry. I didn’t mean for any of this happen.”

“Well you did a pretty shit job of making sure this isn’t how things played out,” you struggle to tell him as it feels like an invisible weight is residing on your chest; causing your breaths to come out hitched and uneven. “God, it’s like I don’t even know you anymore Harry.”

“Don’t know me anymore?” He asks, lowering his voice into a whisper as hurt flashes over his perfectly structured features. “I’m still me, Y/N. I’m still your best friend, and I’m still the man who is in lov-.”

You narrow your teary gaze at him as he cuts himself off before completing his sentence; letting out a small sarcastic laugh and shaking your head as he doesn’t finish his argument. “The man who is what, Harry?”

“The man who is in love with you,” he states, as his eyes pleadingly stare into yours. “Fuck. I don’t know why it’s taken me so long to say that, and I know now is not the best timing but-.”

“No Harry,” you speak over him and shake your head. “If you’re saying this because we had sex, you can take it back right now.” His eyes widen at your words, and you let out another laugh; mainly at yourself this time. “And the funny thing is… If you told me that a month ago, before any of this happened; I would’ve believed you. Why? Because I love you Harry, I always have. I figured agreeing to do this whole thing would help me muster up the courage to finally tell you that, and hell there even was a point where I thought you might’ve actually felt the same. And maybe you do, but your career comes first. It will always come first, which is ok - but because of that; this can’t happen. We can’t happen.”

“You’re wrong about that and you know it,” he argues, stepping forward so he can be closer to you. “We can happen. Y/N, I do love you. I have for years now, it’s not like I’ve tried to hide it. I can’t imagine myself with anyone else at this point… We were made for each other.”

“Who cares about any of that? I don’t,” he explains desperately as he reaches out to gently grab ahold of your hands, and rubs his thumbs across your knuckles. “This relationship may have started out as a publicity stunt, but it’s not like that anymore and it never should have been. Everything I told you the other night in the hotel room is real, this is real Y/N… I need you.”

“Y/N.”

“It’s impossible Harry,” you state, and that glint of hope slowly fades away from his gaze as you pause to collect your thoughts. “You’ve always said things happen for a reason right? Everything that has happened because of this stunt is adding up to a bigger picture, and it’s clear that us being together isn’t part of that. Who are we to change anything about what fate has in store? Everything keeps us apart, and there’s nothing we can do about that.”

“We can try,” he says quietly in one final plea. 

“There’s no point. I’m sorry Harry, it’s out of our hands.” 

He looks at you with an expression you’ve rarely seen in the years you’ve known him; complete and utter defeat, and that hurts like a bitch. But you have to do this, you have to leave so things fall back into order for him and for you.  

With one final shaky breath and a sniffle, you slowly move away from him to start leaving again; and this time he lets you go.

blog.name: emotionally-imbruised
blog.title: So Overrated
blog.description: Ken | fist pumping through life | oh wow, she writes

tags: wow I'm actually writing a mini fic instead of one shots lollll
body:
The Greatest Showmance

Masterlist *on hold*

Harry and Y/N are best friends… there’s no doubt about it. However, things become different and challenging for the pair as Harry’s management team decides to go along with the upcoming second album of his solo career, Harry should have a bit of a new image - one that includes a public girlfriend; and who is better to play the role than his own best friend?

Wanting nothing more than to help your long time friend, you play along… But there isn’t anything that could’ve prepared you for the pain and heartbreak that was to come with it all. With the constant drama and broken promises that arise between you and Harry - you’re left wondering, is this really all worth it?

This mini fic was greatly inspired by the soundtrack of The Greatest Showman, I own nothing related to that amazing movie; just am giving credit in what it inspired.

I attempted to make a Spotify playlist for this btw

Yeah it’s a mini fic cause I’m not patient enough to write a slow burn

Prologue

Chapter 1: The Greatest Show

Chapter 2: Come Alive

TBD

Chapter 3: Rewrite The Stars

TBD

Chapter 4: From Now On

TBD

Chapter 5: This Is Me

TBD

Taglist: If you wanna be added, let me know!
